comment._content:
Another proof for War is Hell.  
I wonder what the white area was in this and in other pictures here.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I think it is probably captioning from the source photos. In this case, it looks like this and several others are copied from a postcard or postcard booklet. All bear the "Nachdruck verboten" (Reprinting forbidden) legend, Phot. 1914, and a number at the opposite lower corner. For instance:
